game.name: Train Simulator: 40CC Loco
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: If you need pulling power, you just found it! This powerhouse is now available, with its unmistakable external styling, to move freight loads in Train Simulator Classic, courtesy of developers RSSLO.
game.shortDescriptionEn: If you need pulling power, you just found it! This powerhouse is now available, with its unmistakable external styling, to move freight loads in Train Simulator Classic, courtesy of developers RSSLO.
